title: Blue Night
description: A young man stands in front of a solitary cabin. He has many questions, and he senses that the answers could be inside. Without another thought, he knocks, and a voice beckons him in.Blue Night seeks to address some of the greatest anxieties of our why are we here? What is our true nature? How do we reconcile our own limitations with our desire to understand? Is true knowledge attainable? If death is inevitable, what is the reason for living?Hoping for answers, the young man enters the cabin, and leaves the cold, blue night behind...
author: Matthew Jones
